prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: In the current period of economic crisis, fraudulent and harmful costume jewelry is appearing more frequently on the market as people try to save money. Customers have been reporting problems and scams encountered both in the Czech Republic and abroad when purchasing finished jewelry and jewelry components.

prompt.content:

# Rules

# The document
